3. TypeScript åŸºç¡€è¯­æ³• â€‹

3-1. åŸºæœ¬ä½¿ç”¨ â€‹

TypeScript
// åŸºæœ¬ç±»å‹
// js ä¹Ÿæœ‰çš„

let color: string = "blue"; // å­—ç¬¦ä¸²

let big1: bigint = BigInt(9007199254740991); // bigint

let a:undefined = undefined; // undefined

let b:null = null; // null

// å£°æ˜ä¸º undefined æˆ– null çš„å˜é‡ï¼Œåç»­ä»»æ„ç±»å‹çš„æ•°æ®å‡ä¸èƒ½ä¸ºè¯¥å˜é‡èµ‹å€¼
// æ‰€ä»¥å¦‚æœè¦åˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸º undefined æˆ– null çš„å€¼ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨è”åˆç±»å‹
let number1:number|undefined = undefined;
let arr1:number[]|null = null;

// ts ç‰¹æœ‰
// ä»»æ„å€¼ï¼Œç­‰åŒäº js ä¸å£°æ˜,åç»­å¯ä»»æ„æ›´æ”¹ç±»å‹
let data1:any = []; 
// ä¸ç¡®å®šå€¼ï¼Œå¯ä»»æ„æ›´æ”¹ç±»å‹ï¼Œå’Œ any åŒºåˆ«ä¸ºè°ƒç”¨è¯¥å€¼çš„æ–¹æ³•æˆ–å±æ€§æ—¶ï¼Œ
// éœ€è¦é€šè¿‡ if åˆ¤æ–­æ˜ç¡®ç±»å‹ï¼Œæˆ–è€…ä½¿ç”¨æ–­è¨€è¯­æ³•
let data2:unknown= []; 

// anyå’ŒunknownåŒºåˆ«çš„æ¡ˆä¾‹
data1.push(2); // æ­£ç¡®
data2.push(2); // æŠ¥é”™ 'data2' is of type 'unknown'
(data2 as number[]).push(2); // æ­£ç¡®
if(Array.isArray(data2)) data2.push(2); // æ­£ç¡®

const list: number[] = [1, 2, 3]; // æ•°ç»„å†™æ³•1
const list:Array<number> = [1,2]; // æ•°ç»„å†™æ³•2
const tuple: [string, number] = ["hello", 10]; // å…ƒç»„

// é»˜è®¤æšä¸¾,é»˜è®¤ Red ä¸º 0,ååºä¾æ¬¡é€’å¢ï¼Œå¦‚ green ä¸º 1ï¼Œblue ä¸º 2 ...

// æ•°å­—æšä¸¾

    Up = 1,        // å¯ä»¥è®¾ç½®èµ·å§‹å€¼
    Down,          // è‡ªåŠ¨é€’å¢ä¸º 2
    Left,          // 3
    Right          // 4
}

// å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æšä¸¾
enum HttpStatus {
    OK = "OK",
    NOT_FOUND = "NOT_FOUND",
    BAD_REQUEST = "BAD_REQUEST",
    SERVER_ERROR = "SERVER_ERROR"
}

// å¼‚æ„æšä¸¾ï¼ˆæ··åˆå‹ï¼‰

    No = 0,
    Yes = "YES",
}
// æšä¸¾ä½¿ç”¨

// Any å’Œ Unknown

let uncertain: unknown = 4;

// ç±»å‹ä¸åŒ¹é…ç¤ºä¾‹
let num: number = 42;
// ä»¥ä¸‹èµ‹å€¼ä¼šå¯¼è‡´ç¼–è¯‘é”™è¯¯
// num = "42"; // é”™è¯¯ï¼šä¸èƒ½å°†ç±»å‹"string"åˆ†é…ç»™ç±»å‹"number"
// num = true; // é”™è¯¯ï¼šä¸èƒ½å°†ç±»å‹"boolean"åˆ†é…ç»™ç±»å‹"number"

let str: string = "hello";
// str = 42; // é”™è¯¯ï¼šä¸èƒ½å°†ç±»å‹"number"åˆ†é…ç»™ç±»å‹"string"

// ä½¿ç”¨ç±»å‹æ–­è¨€å¯ä»¥ç»•è¿‡ç±»å‹æ£€æŸ¥ï¼Œä½†è¦è°¨æ…ä½¿ç”¨

// let strValue: string = numValue as string; // é”™è¯¯ï¼šä¸èƒ½ç›´æ¥æ–­è¨€ä¸ç›¸å…³çš„ç±»å‹

// Void , Null å’Œ Undefined

    console.log("This is a warning message");
}

// ç±»å‹æ¨å¯¼ç¤ºä¾‹

let inferredString = "hello"; // è‡ªåŠ¨æ¨æ–­ä¸º string ç±»å‹
let inferredArray = [1, 2, 3]; // è‡ªåŠ¨æ¨æ–­ä¸º number[] ç±»å‹

    throw new Error(message);

    [sym]: 'value'

// BigInt ç±»å‹

3-2. ç±»å‹åˆ«åï¼ˆTypeï¼‰ â€‹

ç±»å‹åˆ«åç”¨æ¥ç»™ä¸€ä¸ªç±»å‹èµ·ä¸ªæ–°åå­—ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ type å…³é”®å­—ã€‚

// äº¤å‰ç±»å‹

// æ³¨æ„ï¼šä¸‹é¢è¿™è¡Œæ˜¯å¿…é¡»çš„ï¼Œå› ä¸ºç±»å‹å®šä¹‰ä¸­è¦æ±‚æœ‰ `message` å±æ€§ï¼

TypeScript
// æå–å±æ€§ç±»å‹
// ä»å¯¹è±¡ç±»å‹ä¸­æå–æŸä¸ªå±æ€§çš„ç±»å‹

    name: string;
    age: number;
};

// æ˜ å°„ç±»å‹
type Nullable<T> = {
    [P in keyof T]: T[P] | null;
};
// å®ƒéå†æŸä¸ªæ³›å‹ç±»å‹ T çš„æ‰€æœ‰å±æ€§åï¼ˆPï¼‰
// ç„¶åä¸ºæ¯ä¸ªå±æ€§é‡æ–°å®šä¹‰ç±»å‹ä¸ºï¼šåŸç±»å‹ T[P] æˆ– null
// ä½¿ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹

/* ç­‰ä»·äºï¼š
{
  name: string | null;
  age: number | null;
}
*/

// æ¡ä»¶ç±»å‹
// è¯­æ³•ï¼šT extends SomeType ? TrueType : FalseType
// å«ä¹‰ï¼šå¦‚æœ T æ˜¯ null æˆ– undefinedï¼Œè¿”å› neverï¼ˆè¡¨ç¤ºå‰”é™¤ï¼‰ï¼›å¦åˆ™è¿”å› T æœ¬èº«
type NonNullable<T> = T extends null | undefined ? never : T;
// ä½¿ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹
type Foo = string | number | null | undefined;
type Bar = NonNullable<Foo>; // string | number

// æ¨¡æ¿å­—é¢é‡ç±»å‹
type EventName<T extends string> = `${T}Changed`;
type UserEvents = EventName<'name' | 'age'>; // 'nameChanged' | 'ageChanged'

TypeScript
// éƒ¨åˆ†å±æ€§å¯é€‰
// ä½¿ç±»å‹ T çš„æ‰€æœ‰å±æ€§å˜ä¸ºå¯é€‰

    [P in keyof T]?: T[P];
};

// æ‰€æœ‰å±æ€§å¿…é€‰
// â€‹ä½¿ç±»å‹ T çš„æ‰€æœ‰å±æ€§å˜ä¸ºå¿…é€‰ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ -?ç§»é™¤å¯é€‰æ ‡è®°ï¼ˆä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯å¼ºåˆ¶è®©å±æ€§å˜ä¸ºå¿…é€‰ï¼‰

// ä½¿ç±»å‹ T çš„æ‰€æœ‰å±æ€§å˜ä¸ºåªè¯»

    readonly [P in keyof T]: T[P];
};

// ä»Tä¸­é€‰æ‹©éƒ¨åˆ†å±æ€§
// ä»ç±»å‹ T ä¸­é€‰å–éƒ¨åˆ†å±æ€§ Kâ€‹ ç»„æˆæ–°ç±»å‹

// æ’é™¤éƒ¨åˆ†å±æ€§
// ä»ç±»å‹ T ä¸­æ’é™¤æŸäº›å±æ€§ Kï¼Œä¿ç•™å…¶ä½™
type Omit<T, K extends keyof any> = Pick<T, Exclude<keyof T, K>>;

3-3. æ¥å£ï¼ˆInterfaceï¼‰ â€‹

æ¥å£æ˜¯ TypeScript ä¸­ä¸€ä¸ªéå¸¸å¼ºå¤§çš„ç‰¹æ€§ï¼Œå®ƒå¯ä»¥å®šä¹‰å¯¹è±¡çš„ç±»å‹ã€çº¦æŸç±»çš„å®ç°ã€å®šä¹‰å‡½æ•°ç±»å‹ç­‰ã€‚æ¥å£çš„ä½œç”¨æ˜¯ä¸ºè¿™äº›ç±»å‹å‘½åå’Œä¸ºä½ çš„ä»£ç æˆ–ç¬¬ä¸‰æ–¹ä»£ç å®šä¹‰å¥‘çº¦ã€‚

3-3-1. åŸºæœ¬æ¥å£ â€‹

TypeScript
// åŸºæœ¬å¯¹è±¡æ¥å£
interface User {
    name: string;
    age?: number;        // å¯é€‰å±æ€§
    readonly id: number; // åªè¯»å±æ€§
}

const user: User = {
    name: "Tom",
    id: 1
};

// å‡½æ•°æ¥å£
interface SearchFunc {
    (source: string, subString: string): boolean;
}

let mySearch: SearchFunc = function(src: string, sub: string): boolean {
    return src.search(sub) > -1;
};

// å¯ç´¢å¼•çš„æ¥å£
interface StringArray {
    [index: number]: string;
}

let myArray: StringArray = ["Bob", "Fred"];

3-3-2. æ¥å£ç»§æ‰¿ â€‹

TypeScript
// æ¥å£ç»§æ‰¿æ¥å£
interface Animal {
    name: string;
}

interface Dog extends Animal {
    breed: string;
}

const dog: Dog = {
    name: "Spot",
    breed: "Labrador"
};

// æ¥å£ç»§æ‰¿å¤šä¸ªæ¥å£
interface Shape {
    color: string;
}

interface PenStroke {
    penWidth: number;
}

interface Square extends Shape, PenStroke {
    sideLength: number;
}

const square: Square = {
    color: "blue",
    penWidth: 5,
    sideLength: 10
};

// æ¥å£ç»§æ‰¿ç±»
class Control {
    private state: any;
}

interface SelectableControl extends Control {
    select(): void;
}

class Button extends Control implements SelectableControl {
    select() { }
}

3-3-3. æ··åˆç±»å‹æ¥å£ â€‹

æœ‰æ—¶æˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦ä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡åŒæ—¶å…·æœ‰å¤šç§ç±»å‹ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚ä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡å¯ä»¥åŒæ—¶ä½œä¸ºå‡½æ•°å’Œå¯¹è±¡ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚

interface Counter {
    (start: number): string;  // å‡½æ•°
    interval: number;         // å±æ€§
    reset(): void;           // æ–¹æ³•
}

function getCounter(): Counter {
    let counter = function (start: number) { } as Counter;
    counter.interval = 123;
    counter.reset = function () { };
    return counter;
}

let c = getCounter();
c(10);
c.reset();
c.interval = 5.0;

}

    }

    remove(item: T): void;

3-4. Interface vs Type â€‹

TypeScript ä¸­çš„ interface å’Œ type éƒ½å¯ä»¥ç”¨æ¥å®šä¹‰ç±»å‹ï¼Œä½†å®ƒä»¬æœ‰ä¸€äº›é‡è¦çš„åŒºåˆ«å’Œå„è‡ªçš„ä½¿ç”¨åœºæ™¯ã€‚

3-4-1. ä¸»è¦åŒºåˆ« â€‹

  1. å£°æ˜åˆå¹¶ï¼ˆDeclaration Mergingï¼‰
TypeScript
// Interfaceæ”¯æŒå£°æ˜åˆå¹¶
interface User {
  name: string;
}
interface User {
  age: number;
}
// æœ€ç»ˆ User åŒ…å« name å’Œ age ä¸¤ä¸ªå±æ€§

// Typeä¸æ”¯æŒå£°æ˜åˆå¹¶

  name: string;
}
type User = {  // Error: é‡å¤çš„æ ‡è¯†ç¬¦'User'
  age: number;
}
  1. æ‰©å±•è¯­æ³•
TypeScript
// Interface æ‰©å±• interface
interface Animal {
  name: string;
}
interface Dog extends Animal {
  breed: string;
}

// Type æ‰©å±• type
type Animal = {
  name: string;
}
type Dog = Animal & {
  breed: string;
}

// Type å¯ä»¥æ‰©å±• interfaceï¼Œinterface ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥æ‰©å±• type
interface Animal {
  name: string;
}
type Dog = Animal & {
  breed: string;
}

type Animal = {
  name: string;
}
interface Dog extends Animal {
  breed: string;
}
  1. ç»„åˆç±»å‹
TypeScript
// Type å¯ä»¥åˆ›å»ºè”åˆç±»å‹

// Type å¯ä»¥åˆ›å»ºæ˜ å°„ç±»å‹

  readonly [P in keyof T]: T[P];
};

// Interface ä¸èƒ½ç›´æ¥åˆ›å»ºè”åˆç±»å‹æˆ–æ˜ å°„ç±»å‹

// ä½¿ç”¨keyofçº¦æŸå¯¹è±¡å±æ€§

TypeScript
// å¤šä¸ªç±»å‹å‚æ•°
function pair<T, U>(first: T, second: U): [T, U] {
    return [first, second];
}

// æ³›å‹çº¦æŸä¸­ä½¿ç”¨ç±»å‹å‚æ•°
function copyFields<T extends U, U>(target: T, source: U): T {
    const existingRequired: number[] = Reflect.getOwnMetadata("required", target, propertyKey) || [];
    existingRequired.push(parameterIndex);
    Reflect.defineMetadata("required", existingRequired, target, propertyKey);
}

4-1-5. æ¡ä»¶ç±»å‹ â€‹

TypeScript
// åŸºç¡€æ¡ä»¶ç±»å‹
type TypeName<T> = 
    T extends string ? "string" :
    T extends number ? "number" :
    T extends boolean ? "boolean" :
    T extends undefined ? "undefined" :
    T extends Function ? "function" :
    "object";

// åˆ†é…æ¡ä»¶ç±»å‹
type ToArray<T> = T extends any ? T[] : never;
type StrArrOrNumArr = ToArray<string | number>;  // string[] | number[]

// inferå…³é”®å­—
type ReturnType<T> = T extends (...args: any[]) => infer R ? R : any;

// å®é™…åº”ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹
type Unpacked<T> = 
    T extends (infer U)[] ? U :
    T extends (...args: any[]) => infer U ? U :
    T extends Promise<infer U> ? U :
    T;

type T0 = Unpacked<string>;  // string
type T1 = Unpacked<string[]>;  // string
type T2 = Unpacked<() => string>;  // string
type T3 = Unpacked<Promise<string>>;  // string

4-1-6. å®é™…åº”ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹ â€‹

  1. API å“åº”å¤„ç†
TypeScript
// é€šç”¨APIå“åº”ç±»å‹
interface ApiResponse<T> {
    data: T;
    status: number;
    message: string;
    timestamp: number;
}

// å…·ä½“ä¸šåŠ¡ç±»å‹
interface User {
    id: number;
    name: string;
    email: string;
}

// APIæœåŠ¡
class ApiService {
    async get<T>(url: string): Promise<ApiResponse<T>> {
        const response = await fetch(url);
        return response.json();
    }

    async post<T, U>(url: string, data: T): Promise<ApiResponse<U>> {
        const response = await fetch(url, {
            method: 'POST',
            body: JSON.stringify(data)
        });
        return response.json();
    }
}

// ä½¿ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹
const api = new ApiService();
api.get<User>('/api/user/1')
    .then(response => {
        console.log(response.data.name);
    });
  1. çŠ¶æ€ç®¡ç†
TypeScript
// é€šç”¨çŠ¶æ€ç®¡ç†Store
class Store<State> {
    private state: State;

    constructor(initialState: State) {
        this.state = initialState;
    }

    getState(): State {
        return this.state;
    }

    setState(newState: Partial<State>) {
        this.state = { ...this.state, ...newState };
    }
}

// ä½¿ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹
interface UserState {
    currentUser: User | null;
    isLoading: boolean;
    error: string | null;
}

const userStore = new Store<UserState>({
    currentUser: null,
    isLoading: false,
    error: null
});
  1. ç»„ä»¶Propsç±»å‹
TypeScript
// é€šç”¨åˆ—è¡¨ç»„ä»¶
interface ListProps<T> {
    items: T[];
    renderItem: (item: T) => React.ReactNode;
    onItemClick?: (item: T) => void;
}

function List<T>({ items, renderItem, onItemClick }: ListProps<T>) {
    return (
        <ul>
            {items.map((item, index) => (
                <li key={index} onClick={() => onItemClick?.(item)}>
                    {renderItem(item)}
                </li>
            ))}
        </ul>
    );
}

// ä½¿ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹
interface Product {
    id: number;
    name: string;
    price: number;
}

<List<Product>
    items={products}
    renderItem={product => `${product.name}: $${product.price}`}
    onItemClick={product => console.log(`Selected ${product.name}`)}
/>

4.2 è£…é¥°å™¨ â€‹

è£…é¥°å™¨ï¼ˆDecoratorï¼‰æ˜¯ä¸€ç§ç‰¹æ®Šç±»å‹çš„å£°æ˜ï¼Œå®ƒèƒ½å¤Ÿè¢«é™„åŠ åˆ°ç±»å£°æ˜ã€æ–¹æ³•ã€è®¿é—®ç¬¦ã€å±æ€§æˆ–å‚æ•°ä¸Šã€‚è£…é¥°å™¨ä½¿ç”¨@expressionè¿™ç§å½¢å¼ï¼Œexpressionæ±‚å€¼åå¿…é¡»ä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªå‡½æ•°ï¼Œå®ƒä¼šåœ¨è¿è¡Œæ—¶è¢«è°ƒç”¨ï¼Œè¢«è£…é¥°çš„å£°æ˜ä¿¡æ¯ä¼šä½œä¸ºå‚æ•°ä¼ å…¥ã€‚

TIP

æ³¨æ„ï¼šè¦å¯ç”¨è£…é¥°å™¨ç‰¹æ€§ï¼Œéœ€è¦åœ¨tsconfig.jsonä¸­å¯ç”¨experimentalDecoratorsç¼–è¯‘å™¨é€‰é¡¹ï¼š

JSON
{
  "compilerOptions": {  
    "target": "ES5",
    "experimentalDecorators": true
  }
}

4-2-1. ç±»è£…é¥°å™¨ â€‹

ç±»è£…é¥°å™¨åœ¨ç±»å£°æ˜ä¹‹å‰è¢«å£°æ˜ï¼Œåº”ç”¨äºç±»æ„é€ å‡½æ•°ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç”¨æ¥ç›‘è§†ã€ä¿®æ”¹æˆ–æ›¿æ¢ç±»å®šä¹‰ã€‚

TypeScript
// ç®€å•çš„ç±»è£…é¥°å™¨
function sealed(constructor: Function) {
    Object.seal(constructor);
    Object.seal(constructor.prototype);
}

@sealed
class BugReport {
    type = "report";
    title: string;

    constructor(t: string) {
        this.title = t;
    }
}

// è£…é¥°å™¨å·¥å‚
function reportable(isReportable: boolean) {
    return function (constructor: Function) {
        constructor.prototype.isReportable = isReportable;
    }
}

@reportable(true)
class BugReport {
    type = "report";
}

// é‡è½½æ„é€ å‡½æ•°çš„è£…é¥°å™¨
function classDecorator<T extends { new (...args: any[]): {} }>(constructor: T) {
    return class extends constructor {
        newProperty = "new property";
        hello = "override";
    }
}

@classDecorator
class Greeter {
    property = "property";
    hello: string;
    constructor(m: string) {
        this.hello = m;
    }
}

4-2-2. æ–¹æ³•è£…é¥°å™¨ â€‹

æ–¹æ³•è£…é¥°å™¨å£°æ˜åœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•çš„å£°æ˜ä¹‹å‰ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç”¨æ¥ç›‘è§†ã€ä¿®æ”¹æˆ–æ›¿æ¢æ–¹æ³•å®šä¹‰ã€‚

TypeScript
// æ–¹æ³•è£…é¥°å™¨
function log(target: any, propertyKey: string, descriptor: PropertyDescriptor) {
    // ä¿å­˜åŸå§‹çš„æ–¹æ³•
    const originalMethod = descriptor.value;

    // ä¿®æ”¹æ–¹æ³•çš„è¡Œä¸º
    descriptor.value = function(...args: any[]) {
        console.log(`Calling ${propertyKey} with args: ${JSON.stringify(args)}`);
        const result = originalMethod.apply(this, args);
        console.log(`Result: ${JSON.stringify(result)}`);
        return result;
    }
}

class Calculator {
    @log
    add(x: number, y: number) {
        return x + y;
    }
}

// åªè¯»æ–¹æ³•è£…é¥°å™¨
function readonly(target: any, propertyKey: string, descriptor: PropertyDescriptor) {
    descriptor.writable = false;
}

class Example {
    @readonly
    pi() { return 3.14; }
}

4-2-3. è®¿é—®å™¨è£…é¥°å™¨ â€‹

è®¿é—®å™¨è£…é¥°å™¨å£°æ˜åœ¨è®¿é—®å™¨å£°æ˜ä¹‹å‰ï¼Œåº”ç”¨äºè®¿é—®å™¨çš„å±æ€§æè¿°ç¬¦ã€‚

TypeScript
function configurable(value: boolean) {
    return function (target: any, propertyKey: string, descriptor: PropertyDescriptor) {
        descriptor.configurable = value;
    };
}

class Point {
    private _x: number;
    private _y: number;

    constructor(x: number, y: number) {
        this._x = x;
        this._y = y;
    }

    @configurable(false)
    get x() { return this._x; }

    @configurable(false)
    get y() { return this._y; }
}

4-2-4. å±æ€§è£…é¥°å™¨ â€‹

å±æ€§è£…é¥°å™¨å£°æ˜åœ¨å±æ€§å£°æ˜ä¹‹å‰ï¼Œç”¨äºç›‘è§†ç±»ä¸­æ˜¯å¦å£°æ˜äº†æŸä¸ªå±æ€§ã€‚

TypeScript
// å±æ€§è£…é¥°å™¨
function defaultValue(value: string) {
    return function (target: any, propertyName: string) {
        target[propertyName] = value;
    }
}

class Example {
    @defaultValue("default")
    name!: string;
}

// éªŒè¯è£…é¥°å™¨
function validate(target: any, propertyName: string) {
    let value: string;
    
    const getter = function() {
        return value;
    };
    
    const setter = function(newVal: string) {
        if (newVal.length < 3) {
            throw new Error("Value must be at least 3 characters long.");
        }
        value = newVal;
    };
    
    Object.defineProperty(target, propertyName, {
        get: getter,
        set: setter
    });
}

class User {
    @validate
    password!: string;
}

4-2-5. å‚æ•°è£…é¥°å™¨ â€‹

å‚æ•°è£…é¥°å™¨å£°æ˜åœ¨å‚æ•°å£°æ˜ä¹‹å‰ï¼Œç”¨äºç›‘è§†å‡½æ•°å‚æ•°æ˜¯å¦è¢«ä¼ å…¥ã€‚

TypeScript
function required(target: Object, propertyKey: string | symbol, parameterIndex: number) {
    const existingRequired: number[] = Reflect.getOwnMetadata("required", target, propertyKey) || [];
    existingRequired.push(parameterIndex);
    Reflect.defineMetadata("required", existingRequired, target, propertyKey);
}

function validate(target: any, propertyName: string, descriptor: PropertyDescriptor) {
    const method = descriptor.value;

    descriptor.value = function(...args: any[]) {
        const requiredParameters: number[] = Reflect.getOwnMetadata("required", target, propertyName) || [];
        
        requiredParameters.forEach(index => {
            if (args[index] === undefined) {
                throw new Error(`Parameter at index ${index} is required.`);
            }
        });

        return method.apply(this, args);
    }
}

class UserService {
    @validate
    createUser(@required name: string, @required email: string, age?: number) {
        // åˆ›å»ºç”¨æˆ·çš„é€»è¾‘
    }
}

4-2-6. å®é™…åº”ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹ â€‹

TypeScript
// 1. æ€§èƒ½ç›‘æ§è£…é¥°å™¨
function measure(target: any, propertyKey: string, descriptor: PropertyDescriptor) {
    const originalMethod = descriptor.value;

    descriptor.value = async function(...args: any[]) {
        const start = performance.now();
        const result = await originalMethod.apply(this, args);
        const end = performance.now();
        console.log(`${propertyKey} took ${end - start}ms to execute`);
        return result;
    }
}

// 2. ç¼“å­˜è£…é¥°å™¨
function memoize(target: any, propertyKey: string, descriptor: PropertyDescriptor) {
    const originalMethod = descriptor.value;
    const cache = new Map();

    descriptor.value = function(...args: any[]) {
        const key = JSON.stringify(args);
        if (cache.has(key)) {
            return cache.get(key);
        }
        const result = originalMethod.apply(this, args);
        cache.set(key, result);
        return result;
    }
}

// 3. æƒé™æ§åˆ¶è£…é¥°å™¨
function requireRole(role: string) {
    return function (target: any, propertyKey: string, descriptor: PropertyDescriptor) {
        const originalMethod = descriptor.value;

        descriptor.value = function(...args: any[]) {
            if (!currentUser.hasRole(role)) {
                throw new Error(`Requires role: ${role}`);
            }
            return originalMethod.apply(this, args);
        }
    }
}

// ä½¿ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹
class UserController {
    @measure
    @requireRole('admin')
    async getAllUsers() {
        // è·å–ç”¨æˆ·åˆ—è¡¨
    }

    @memoize
    calculateExpensiveValue(input: number) {
        // å¤æ‚è®¡ç®—
    }
}

type Combined = Type1 & Type2;

// ç±»å‹åˆ«å
type Point = {
    x: number;
    y: number;
};

  configureWebpack: {

        '@': path.resolve(__dirname, 'src')
      }

      .rule('ts')

5-3. Vueç»„ä»¶ç¤ºä¾‹ â€‹

TypeScript
<script lang="ts">
import { defineComponent, ref } from 'vue'

// å®šä¹‰æ¥å£
interface Todo {
  id: number
  title: string
  completed: boolean
}

export default defineComponent({
  name: 'TodoList',
  props: {
    initialTodos: {
      type: Array as () => Todo[],
      required: true
    }
  },
  setup(props) {
    const todos = ref<Todo[]>(props.initialTodos)
    const newTodo = ref('')

    const addTodo = () => {
      if (newTodo.value.trim()) {
        todos.value.push({
          id: Date.now(),
          title: newTodo.value,
          completed: false
        })
        newTodo.value = ''
      }
    }

    const toggleTodo = (id: number) => {
      const todo = todos.value.find(todo => todo.id === id)
      if (todo) {
        todo.completed = !todo.completed
      }
    }

    return {
      todos,
      newTodo,
      addTodo,
      toggleTodo
    }
  }
})
</script>

<template>
  <div>
    <input v-model="newTodo" @keyup.enter="addTodo" />
    <ul>
      <li v-for="todo in todos" :key="todo.id">
        <input
          type="checkbox"
          :checked="todo.completed"
          @change="toggleTodo(todo.id)"
        />
        {{ todo.title }}
      </li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</template>

6-3. Reactç»„ä»¶ç¤ºä¾‹ â€‹

TypeScript
import React, { useState } from 'react';

// å®šä¹‰æ¥å£
interface Todo {
  id: number;
  title: string;
  completed: boolean;
}

interface Props {
  initialTodos: Todo[];
}

const TodoList: React.FC<Props> = ({ initialTodos }) => {
  const [todos, setTodos] = useState<Todo[]>(initialTodos);
  const [newTodo, setNewTodo] = useState<string>('');

  const addTodo = (e: React.KeyboardEvent<HTMLInputElement>) => {
    if (e.key === 'Enter' && newTodo.trim()) {
      setTodos([
        ...todos,
        {
          id: Date.now(),
          title: newTodo,
          completed: false
        }
      ]);
      setNewTodo('');
    }
  };

  const toggleTodo = (id: number) => {
    setTodos(
      todos.map(todo =>
        todo.id === id
          ? { ...todo, completed: !todo.completed }
          : todo
      )
    );
  };

  return (
    <div>
      <input
        value={newTodo}
        onChange={(e) => setNewTodo(e.target.value)}
        onKeyPress={addTodo}
      />
      <ul>
        {todos.map(todo => (
          <li key={todo.id}>
            <input
              type="checkbox"
              checked={todo.completed}
              onChange={() => toggleTodo(todo.id)}
            />
            {todo.title}
          </li>
        ))}
      </ul>
    </div>
  );
};

export default TodoList;

8-1. éƒ¨åˆ†ç±»å‹å·¥å…· â€‹

TypeScript
// Partial<T> - å°†ç±»å‹çš„æ‰€æœ‰å±æ€§å˜ä¸ºå¯é€‰
interface Todo {
    title: string;
    description: string;
    completed: boolean;
}

// æ‰€æœ‰å­—æ®µéƒ½å˜ä¸ºå¯é€‰
type PartialTodo = Partial<Todo>;
// ç­‰ä»·äºï¼š
// {
//    title?: string;
//    description?: string;
//    completed?: boolean;
// }

// Required<T> - å°†ç±»å‹çš„æ‰€æœ‰å±æ€§å˜ä¸ºå¿…é€‰
type RequiredTodo = Required<PartialTodo>;
// æ‰€æœ‰å¯é€‰å±æ€§éƒ½å˜ä¸ºå¿…é€‰

// Readonly<T> - å°†ç±»å‹çš„æ‰€æœ‰å±æ€§å˜ä¸ºåªè¯»
type ReadonlyTodo = Readonly<Todo>;
// æ‰€æœ‰å±æ€§éƒ½å˜ä¸ºåªè¯»ï¼Œä¸èƒ½è¢«ä¿®æ”¹

8-2. æå–å’Œæ’é™¤ç±»å‹å·¥å…· â€‹

TypeScript
// Pick<T, K> - ä»ç±»å‹ä¸­é€‰æ‹©éƒ¨åˆ†å±æ€§
type TodoPreview = Pick<Todo, 'title' | 'completed'>;
// ç­‰ä»·äºï¼š
// {
//    title: string;
//    completed: boolean;
// }

// Omit<T, K> - ä»ç±»å‹ä¸­æ’é™¤æŒ‡å®šå±æ€§
type TodoWithoutDescription = Omit<Todo, 'description'>;
// ç­‰ä»·äºï¼š
// {
//    title: string;
//    completed: boolean;
// }

// Extract<T, U> - æå–è”åˆç±»å‹ä¸­çš„æŒ‡å®šç±»å‹
type T0 = Extract<'a' | 'b' | 'c', 'a' | 'f'>;  // 'a'
type T1 = Extract<string | number | (() => void), Function>;  // () => void

// Exclude<T, U> - ä»è”åˆç±»å‹ä¸­æ’é™¤æŒ‡å®šç±»å‹
type T2 = Exclude<'a' | 'b' | 'c', 'a'>;  // 'b' | 'c'
type T3 = Exclude<string | number | (() => void), Function>;  // string | number

8-3. ç±»å‹æ¨æ–­å·¥å…· â€‹

TypeScript
// ReturnType<T> - è·å–å‡½æ•°è¿”å›å€¼ç±»å‹
function f1(): { a: number; b: string } {
    return { a: 1, b: 'hello' };
}
type F1Return = ReturnType<typeof f1>;  // { a: number; b: string }

// Parameters<T> - è·å–å‡½æ•°å‚æ•°ç±»å‹
function f2(arg1: number, arg2: string): void {}
type F2Params = Parameters<typeof f2>;  // [number, string]

// InstanceType<T> - è·å–æ„é€ å‡½æ•°ç±»å‹çš„å®ä¾‹ç±»å‹
class C {
    x = 0;
    y = 0;
}
type T4 = InstanceType<typeof C>;  // C

8-4. æ¡ä»¶ç±»å‹å·¥å…· â€‹

TypeScript
// NonNullable<T> - ä»ç±»å‹ä¸­æ’é™¤ null å’Œ undefined
type T5 = NonNullable<string | number | undefined | null>;  // string | number

// Record<K, T> - åˆ›å»ºå…·æœ‰æŒ‡å®šå±æ€§å’Œç±»å‹çš„å¯¹è±¡ç±»å‹
type PageInfo = {
    title: string;
    url: string;
}
type Pages = Record<'home' | 'about' | 'contact', PageInfo>;
// ç­‰ä»·äºï¼š
// {
//    home: PageInfo;

//    contact: PageInfo;
// }

8.5 å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ“ä½œå·¥å…· â€‹

TypeScript
// Uppercase<T> - å°†å­—ç¬¦ä¸²å­—é¢é‡ç±»å‹è½¬æ¢ä¸ºå¤§å†™
type T6 = Uppercase<'hello'>;  // 'HELLO'

// Lowercase<T> - å°†å­—ç¬¦ä¸²å­—é¢é‡ç±»å‹è½¬æ¢ä¸ºå°å†™
type T7 = Lowercase<'HELLO'>;  // 'hello'

// Capitalize<T> - å°†å­—ç¬¦ä¸²å­—é¢é‡ç±»å‹çš„é¦–å­—æ¯è½¬æ¢ä¸ºå¤§å†™

8-6. å®é™…åº”ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹ â€‹

TypeScript
// 1. åˆ›å»ºéƒ¨åˆ†æ›´æ–°ç±»å‹
interface User {
    id: number;
    name: string;
    email: string;
    age: number;
    address: {
        street: string;
        city: string;
        country: string;
    };
}

// ç”¨äºæ›´æ–°ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯çš„ç±»å‹ï¼Œæ‰€æœ‰å­—æ®µéƒ½æ˜¯å¯é€‰çš„
type UserUpdate = Partial<User>;

// åªå…è®¸æ›´æ–°æŸäº›å­—æ®µ
type UserProfileUpdate = Pick<User, 'name' | 'email' | 'age'>;

// 2. åˆ›å»ºAPIå“åº”ç±»å‹
type ApiSuccess<T> = {
    status: 'success';
    data: T;
    timestamp: number;
};

type ApiError = {
    status: 'error';
    error: string;
    code: number;
};

type ApiResponse<T> = ApiSuccess<T> | ApiError;

// 3. è¡¨å•å¤„ç†
interface FormField<T> {
    value: T;
    error?: string;
    touched: boolean;
    dirty: boolean;
}

type FormFields<T> = {
    [K in keyof T]: FormField<T[K]>;
};

// ä½¿ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹
interface LoginForm {
    username: string;
    password: string;
    rememberMe: boolean;
}

type LoginFormState = FormFields<LoginForm>;
// ç­‰ä»·äºï¼š
// {
//    username: FormField<string>;
//    password: FormField<string>;
//    rememberMe: FormField<boolean>;
// }

// 4. ç±»å‹å®‰å…¨çš„äº‹ä»¶å¤„ç†
type EventMap = {
    click: MouseEvent;
    keypress: KeyboardEvent;
    submit: SubmitEvent;
};

type EventHandler<K extends keyof EventMap> = (event: EventMap[K]) => void;

// ä½¿ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹
const handleClick: EventHandler<'click'> = (event) => {
    // event è¢«æ­£ç¡®æ¨æ–­ä¸º MouseEvent
    console.log(event.clientX, event.clientY);
};
